channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Gaza’s Rafah border crossing with Egypt reopens for limited travel – latest updates
item.description: Rafah crossing in the south, which has largely been closed since May 2024, has reopened for those travelling on foot More than 400 European former top...

item.title: US woman resolves misdemeanor case opened after accusing priest of predatory behavior
item.description: Heather Jones of Alabama says two-year probation agreement leaves her ‘free and clear’ of legal matter An Alabama woman has resolved a misdemeanor cas...

item.title: Suffolk serial killer Steve Wright admits murdering 17-year-old in 1999
item.description: The 67-year-old pleads guilty at Old Bailey to killing Victoria Hall, his sixth murder victim The Suffolk serial killer Steve Wright has pleaded guilt...

item.title: Talks between Ukraine and Russia to restart on Wednesday, Kremlin says – latest news
item.description: The countries have come closer to agreeing on some issues, according to Russia, but there are some complex differences Ukraine’s Volodymyr Zelenskyy s...

item.title: New Epstein files reveal he may have trafficked girls to others despite official denials
item.description: Allegations prompt questions about officials’ contentions that there isn’t evidence to investigate third parties The disclosure of more than 3m files ...

item.title: Fulham reject Everton's approach for Wilson
item.description: Fulham reject an offer from Everton for Harry Wilson, with the midfielder set to be out of contract this summer.

item.title: Celtic turn down Forest's £17m bid for Engels
item.description: Celtic reject a bid of about £17m from Nottingham Forest for Belgium midfielder Arne Engels.

item.title: Bad Bunny makes Grammy history as stars protest against ICE
item.description: Other prizes went to Billie Eilish, Olivia Dean and Lady Gaga, at a ceremony dominated by politics.

item.title: Israel reopens Gaza's key Rafah border crossing with Egypt
item.description: Only dozens of Palestinians and no goods will be able to cross in both directions each day.

item.title: Bencic & Svitolina make history with top-10 places
item.description: Belinda Bencic and Elina Svitolina become the first mothers to be ranked inside the world's top 10 at the same time.
